title: Definitions
context: [ยง286G-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter: &ldquo;Conviction&rdquo; includes, in the case of a minor, not only a conviction of the offense but also an adjudication of delinquency by a family court, and any disposition of the case which involves an admission on the commission of the offense. &ldquo;Driver&rdquo;, &ldquo;owner&rdquo;, &ldquo;parking&rdquo;, &ldquo;standing&rdquo;, &ldquo;stopping&rdquo;, and &ldquo;vehicle&rdquo; have the meanings defined by section 291C-1. [L 1974, c 91, pt of ยง1] Revision Note Numeric designations deleted and definitions rearranged.
